ygData.subject: RE: Twinking
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Your faction with the live frogs starts at the bottom of dubious.  Killing 1 or 3 frogs puts you at threatening, which is KOS if you stand next to them too
ygData.messageBody:
On Tue, 5 Oct 1999, Reece, Tom - 25IDL G4 wrote:
>
> You and I think alike:-)
>
> I have yet to kill a froglok so my faction with them should be indifferent.

Your faction with the live frogs starts at the bottom of
dubious. Killing 1 or 3 frogs puts you at threatening, which
is KOS if you stand next to them too long or they see you
fighting (say, gators or spiders). However, killing undead
froggies raises your faction with the live ones.

> This should allow me to safely go whereever the spawn is for the Guise and
> pay someone to let me loot it. Anyone have a idea of how much I should
> offer for the looting rights?

It's on the undead froglok side. Good faction with the live
frogs will do nothing for you there. We had two parties
heading towards the spot together (10 people total, levels 30
to 42) and unfortunately got a train run through us. It
passed completely through us, but we knew it was coming back
when the people conducting the train either died or zoned, and
frantically started to invis-to-undead everyone. We didn't
finish it in time. One of us got attacked, after which people
dropped their invisibility to defend him, and all hell broke
loose. Only 3 of us made it out alive.

Have fun. :-)

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
